description:
Bonobono is watching grass sway in the breeze when he thinks of a new game. He decides to become friends with the wind and stands up. The wind begins to blow against Bonobono. The strong wind knocks Bonobono over... and then he springs back up. He declares that he is having fun. Then Bonobono goes straight to Chipmunk`s house.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Let`s Be Friends with the Wind
